hero.title: Confidence
hero.tagline: A fully organic silica powder born from Mother Vegetables
hero.catch2: Nurtures both your skin and the Earth
hero.body:
Born from Mother Vegetables, Mazavege Confidence is the world’s only silica that gently nurtures your skin while helping restore the Earth’s environment.

A new kind of skincare is born—one that nurtures your beauty and the future of our planet at the same time.

The kindness you show your skin becomes kindness to the Earth. It all begins with your intentional choice.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: Is it suitable for all skin types?
faq.a1:
Yes, it can be used on various skin types including dry and sensitive skin.
*Note: This does not guarantee zero irritation for everyone.*
We recommend a patch test on a small, inconspicuous area before first use.
faq.q2: Can it be used on babies?
faq.a2:
Silica is known to be most abundant in infants and decreases with growth.
It can be used for babies; however, because their skin is especially delicate,
please test on a small area first.
faq.a3:
Although it has been evaluated as “Premium Food Grade” under FDA-aligned testing, it is not a food product.
There is no particular risk if it gets in your mouth, but please use it as a cosmetic.
faq.q4: Does it have an expiration date?
faq.a4:
The product is highly stable and can be stored long-term if unopened.
After opening, please use as early as possible to maintain quality.
faq.q5: Is it safe during pregnancy or breastfeeding?
faq.a5: There are no specific restrictions. If you have concerns, please consult your physician.
faq.q6: Can I use it with other skincare products?
faq.a6: Yes. You can use it after toner, serum, or emulsion, etc.
faq.q7: Is it okay to use on the scalp?
faq.a7: Yes. It helps control greasiness and may improve sebum-related concerns on the scalp.
faq.a9: Avoid high temperature, humidity, and direct sunlight. Store in a cool, dark place.

feature.title: What is  Mother Vegetables ?
feature.lead:
Mother Vegetables (aka “Mazavegi”) is
an organism that has existed unchanged for about 3.5 billion years,
often called the beginning of life.
It is the only source in the world that can organically produce silica
at 97.1%–99.9999% purity.
(Our group holds the technology under international patent WO2023234765.)

merit.title: Benefits of Growing and Using Mazavegi Confidence

list.0:
Growing Mazavegi absorbs CO2 via photosynthesis
　 (≈700× natural turf).
list.1:
No pesticides or chemical fertilizers
　are used during production.
list.2: Manufactured in facilities that do not pollute soil.
list.3:
Residual components after silica extraction
　can be used as organic fertilizer, etc.
list.4:
Fully organic “Mazavegi Confidence” achieves
　the world’s only top purity of 99.9999%.

conventional.title: Common Manufacturing of High-Purity Silica
conventional.p2:
These methods risk chemical residue and allergic reactions,
so applying to skin can be risky.
Other-source silica falls below the 95% purity quasi-drug standard.

callout.p:
Mazavegi Confidence is produced entirely without chemicals,
and the more you use it, the more it contributes to CO2 reduction.

For skin and planet alike—
the world’s only high-purity organic silica powder.
Give it a try.
callout.note: (Being organic-derived and amorphous, it is non-carcinogenic.)

0.title: Before makeup
0.body:
Apply 50 mg thinly with a puff or brush
before foundation.

1.title: Night skincare
1.body:
Use 50 mg together with lotion or cream
before going to bed.

2.title: For areas of concern
2.body:
For underarms or delicate zones,
mix with a coin-sized amount of water and rub in.

3.title: For allergies or atopy
3.body: Massage in so it fills the micro-gaps of the skin.

4.title: For acne-prone skin
4.body: Gently blend with your finger on the concerned acne.

5.title: For shine or makeup breakdown
5.body: Tidy with a brush over your makeup.

6.title: As a spray

Mix Mazavegi Silica with water to make a spray
(antibacterial and antioxidant effects).
